mapper.select: select reply_num, shared_cardnum, cardnum, m_id, to_char(inputdate,'YY-MM-DD') inputdate, reply from reply where shared_cardnum = #{shared_cardnum} order by inputdate
mapper.insert: insert into reply( reply_num, shared_cardnum, cardnum, m_id, inputdate, reply ) values ( replynum_seq.nextval, #{shared_cardnum}, #{cardnum}, #{m_id}, sysdate, #{reply})
mapper.select: select r.book_num, r.m_id, r.sharecount from (select book_num, m_id, count(shared_cardnum) sharecount from sharedcard group by m_id, book_num having book_num=#{book_num} order by count(shared_cardnum) desc) r where rownum = 1

select r.shared_cardnum, r.m_id, r.replycount from( select shared_cardnum, m_id, count(reply) replycount from reply group by m_id, shared_cardnum having shared_cardnum = (select shared_cardnum from sharedcard where book_num = #{param1} and cardnum=#{param2}) order by count(reply) desc) r where rownum = 1
